title: Mails in IMAP subfolders do not show up
creator: sven_gosslau
content:
I just installed Thunderbird 12.0 on my Phone (Galaxy Note20, Android 13). Account setting were taken from my Desktop PC using the QR Code. In all three Accounts only Mails in the Main IMAP-Inbox are shown. Subfolders (like "sent" or "drafts") are all found, but the messages inside will not be shown. It will only say "Load more messages" but does not find any. In K9-Maiil 11.1 this still worked, but I had to uninstall it as after the automatic update to 12.0 it suddenly kept crashing on startup.

Already tried to add my main account from scratch on my tablet (with a fresh install of Thunderbird 12.0), but the problem with empty subfolders remains.

Any thoughts on this?

title: Last subfolder blocked by interface bottons on Android 16
creator: forpeterssake
content: After updating to Android 16, the last folder in the list is blocked by the Android interface buttons (back, home, app) and cannot be selected.
